item.title: AI Agents Took Over Giving Tuesday. Here’s What Comes Next.
item.description: Nonprofits leaned on AI agents to survive the Giving Tuesday surge. Leaders say this year marks a turning point in how missions scale.

item.title: Gene Editing Or Gene Silencing: The Therapies Poised To Transform Medicine
item.description: Revolutions in gene therapy are rapidly changing the landscape of modern medicine, forcing society and science alike to confront a pivotal question.

item.title: What Is Regenerative Travel? And Who Is Leading The Way In 2026
item.description: We often hear that 'regenerative tourism’ is just a flashy new buzzword, or a rebrand of sustainability. But that couldn't be further from the truth.

item.title: OpenAI’s “Code Red” Shows Timely Competition In Emerging Models
item.description: Altman sidelines ads and search ambitions to rapidly improve ChatGPT’s speed, reliability, personalization, and honesty.

item.title: ‘Metroid Prime 4: Beyond’ Switch 2 Review: C’est Vi-O-La
item.description: It’s taken a long time for us to get 'Metroid Prime 4', and the game is certainly excellent, but did it really need to take 8 years?
